Full Coverage Hair & Beard Colour by Colorsmith Merchant video Full Coverage Get maximum grey coverage with ammonia-free, permanent hair and beard colour. Offers up to 100% grey coverage. Seamless colour matching. Dimensional, long-lasting colour. Resists fading for up to 30 washes. Previous page Next page Mix. Pour hair colour into the developer bottle. Shake. Shake well until everything is evenly distributed. Apply. Follow the included directions for the best application technique for you. Wash and go. After allowing the colour to develop, simply wash your hair and go. Comparison Metrics Full Coverage Hair Dye Add To Basket Demi-Permanent Hair Dye Add To Basket Styling Creme Paste Buying Options Grooming Lotion Add To Basket Customer Reviews 3.4 out of 5 stars 57 2.2 out of 5 stars 4 3.9 out of 5 stars 31 4.4 out of 5 stars 29 Price £23.70 £ 23 . 70 £24.95 £ 24 . 95 — £13.50 £ 13 . 50 Category Hair Colour Hair Colour Styling Product Styling Product What is it? All-in-one Hair Colour Kit All-in-one Hair Colour Kit Everyday Styler Everyday Styler Key Benefits Up to 100% Grey Coverage Subtle Grey Coverage Adds Texture & Definition Adds Light Hold & Moisture When to use it? Once Every 4-6 Weeks Once Every 4-6 Weeks Daily Daily Permanency Level Permanent Demi-Permanent - - How do I know what colour is right for me? We suggest that you choose a colour that is no more than two shades lighter or darker than your current hair colour. What if I currently use your custom colour? Can I find a perfect colour match? Please consult with your Colorsmith colourist. With custom colour, we use different pigments, developers, and formula types to match your goals. As this is a one-size-fits-all product, this formula may be different than what you are currently using. What is the difference between permanent and demi-permanent hair dye? Permanent dye often lasts longer than demi-permanent hair dye while providing up to 100% grey coverage. Demi-permanent hair dye often fades naturally over time and offers more subtle grey coverage. Both are Ammonia-, Resorcinol-, and PPD-free. How long will this hair colour last? It can vary depending on the condition of your hair, how often you wash your hair, and what types of products you use. Generally, you can expect this hair colour to resist fading for about 24 washes. Will I have an allergic reaction to this hair dye? We highly recommend performing an allergy test before using this product. Although our dye is designed to be allergy-friendly with an Ammonia-, Resorcinol-, and PPD-free formula, we cannot predict how your skin will react.

product_details_tab_data.Safety Warning: Important: Hair colour products can cause an allergic reaction which in rare cases, can be severe. Therefore you must follow these precautions: Do not use if: You have already had a reaction to a hair colour product, you have a sensitive, itchy, irritated or damaged scalp. If you have a tattoo, the risks of allergic reaction may be increased. Perform a skin allergy test 48 hours before each use of this product even if you have already used hair colouring products before. If you notice and skin colour changes or other allergic reactions, such as pain or severe itching, discontinue use immediately. Do not use over henna or progressive colour. Read and follow directions included. Wear gloves provided in kit. Thoroughly rinse hair after application.
